page.title: 03INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {"ALBY NICK"}AS HE IS AFFECTIONATELY KNOWN,IS NOW MORE THAN 80 YEARS OF AGE.HE IS FAMOUS FOR HIS VOLANTRY WORK WITH THE BOYS OF THE LOCALITY.{ALBY} HAS RECEIVED THE{B.E.M}.IN RECOGNITION OF HIS SERVICES AS WELL AS THE{ {"DIAMOND"}AWARD FROM THE NATIONAL ASSOCATION OF BOYS CLUBS FOR HIS 60 YEARS WORK IN THE BOYS CLUB MOVEMENT. HE TOLD US OF{LORD DAVIES OF {LLANDINAM},A COAL OWNER AT THE BEGINNING OF THE CENTURY,WHO ASKED SOME PROMINENT LOCAL PEOPLE TO ORGANISE THE BUILDING OF A HOLIDAY CAMP FOR THE BOYS OF MINING FAMILIES.LOCAL BOYS CLUBS WERE BUILT IN MINING COMMUNITIES AS WELL AS THE HOLIDAY VILLAGE AT ST.ATHAN,NEAR BARRY.THE MONEY CAME FROM MINERS-1PENNY PER Â£ PER WEEK OF THEIR WAGES INTO A WELFARE FUND.
